name: Lingotopia
description: Lingotopia is a language learning game about being lost in a city where you don't speak the language. Learn Chinese, French, German, Japanese, Russian, Spanish and more!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete GPU with 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Subject to change
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
